strings.Value: "It's a special day for a special person. You know I wouldn't be hanging around someone unworthy, right? {name}, you've already achieved more than most dare dream of."

"Your birth date is enshrined in the chronicles, and some poor scholar somewhere will have to memorize it if he wants to pass his Northern Avistan History exam. So, Happy Birthday, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}! Be well â€“ and don't forget to update those chronicles with one or two heroic deeds. Each year."
